Title: Securing Our Legacy
Description:
I have not worked this hard and come this far to lose the Citadel now! 

Unfortunately, new threats have emerged. Can I count on your assistance to deal with them? 

Help secure the area. Seek out and eliminate two of our most powerful enemies.
ObjectivesText: Eliminate two rare enemies within the Obsidian Citadel or Slagmire.
RewardText: Well done! I knew I could count on you, friend.
